attributes.action: In UK Skilled Workers protection of 5-Year ILR Path instead of 10-Year ILR path
attributes.additional_details:
Skilled visa holders have played a vital role in the success and stability of the United Kingdom. We

Pay high taxes (often 40%+) and support NHS and public services.
Work in vital sectors: healthcare, tech, finance, logistics, and education.
Invest in homes and communities, and raise families here.
Helped stabilize the workforce, especially since Brexit at the start of 2021.
attributes.background:
Help Secure Transition Protection for Skilled Visa Holders!

Skilled visa holders already on the 5-year ILR path in the UK deserve fairness and certainty, not a sudden shift to a 10-year ILR route.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
